definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The Hong Kong team also won a bronze medal in the water ski team event.
sentences.chinese: 香港隊在滑水隊際賽中同時亦奪得一面銅牌。

sentences.english: I am much interested in water-skiing.
sentences.chinese: 我對滑水運動很感興趣。
我以前從未做過滑水運動。

sentences.english: Water skiing is one of the newest in the family of sports.
sentences.chinese: 滑水是一種新型的家庭的運動。

sentences.english: Wakeboarding festivals and competitions have been held in Singapore and Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 衝浪滑水運動節和競賽已經在新加坡和香港舉行過。

sentences.english: Water-skiing is one of the newest sports.
sentences.chinese: 滑水運動是最新的運動項目之一。

sentences.english: Water-skiing really brings out the animal in Tom.
sentences.chinese: 滑水運動真正激發出了湯姆的活力與激情。

sentences.english: This is ideal for Day Outings, Fishing and Waterskiing.
sentences.chinese: 實用於白晝外出遠足，釣魚，滑水。

sentences.english: Water-skiing is one of the newest in the family of sports.
sentences.chinese: 滑水是運動家庭中最新地成員之一。

sentences.english: My grandpa Ben is always happy, he taught me to water-ski.
sentences.chinese: 我爺爺本總是很開心，他教會我滑水。

sentences.english: Yes, it is really exciting to water-ski .
sentences.chinese: 是的，滑水的確非常刺激。

sentences.english: He promised to teach her to water-ski.
Water-skiing rewhichley brings away the living bes in Linda.
sentences.chinese: 滑水運動真正激發出了湯姆的活力與激情。

sentences.english: Peter offered to teach them water-skiing.
sentences.chinese: 彼得主動提出要教他們滑水。

sentences.english: Eric indicated that he had an accident in wakeboarding and had a neck and back pain.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威表示日前滑水時遇意外令頸背受傷。

sentences.english: Did you go water-ski during your holiday?

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
